text: ï»¿Can you climb up the tree?
Can you do this? Oh, you're good!
Can you play "You Are My Sunshine"?
It's dangerous. Can't you read that sign?
Hi, you can hear me, can't you?
Wonderful. Will you be able to start in two weeks?
Also, will you be able to pick me up at the airport?
Do you know how to speak English?
What about chicken soup? Do you know how to make it?
